lines: NOW JUST A WORD FOR JESUS
Tumvwe ijwi lya Jesu, Mwenzinyoko wini,
Tumvwe ijwi lya Jesu, Litugwasye mu lwendo,
Ijwi lya Mwami Jesu, Koimba paila.
A luse lwakwe Mwami, Tusike kujulu.
Tumvwe ijwi lya Jesu, A Ciingano ca kwe
Tumvwe ijwi lya Jesu, Kutali ku muka,
Tumvwe ijwi lya Jesu, Lusyomo lwa Mwana,
Mu bubi bwenu buka, Mulipe ku Mwami.
